cars.name: Model S
cars.description: Tesla Model S AWD Long Range delivers ~410 mi range, 670 hp and 0‑60 mph in ~3.1 s.

subcar.name: Model S Plaid
subcar.description: Tesla Model S Plaid with ~348 mi range, tri‑motor producing 1,020 hp and 0‑60 mph ~2.0 s.

detCardTravel.title: The Future of Travel Is Autonomous
detCardTravel.subtitle: Enter your destination and your Model S will manage your drive, from start to finish. Full Self-Driving (Supervised) provides advanced features that offer more active guidance and assisted driving under your active supervision.

detCardTriMotor.title: Tri-Motor Power
detCardTriMotor.subtitle: Three carbon-sleeved rotors and an enhanced battery system ensure maximum power without performance degradation, even during back-to-back runs

detCardPerformance.title: All-Electric Performance
detCardPerformance.subtitle: A high-performance powertrain and advanced battery system unlock instant torque, efficiency and range. An optimized thermal system allows for faster charging and more consistent power at the track or on the road.

slider1.title: Optimized Performance
slider1.subtitle: Staggered wheels and tires maximize grip and stability while carbon ceramic brakes5 on Plaid provide extra stopping power.

slider2.title: Optimized Performance
slider2.subtitle: Staggered wheels and tires maximize grip and stability while carbon ceramic brakes5 on Plaid provide extra stopping power.

slider3.title: Optimized Performance
slider3.subtitle: Staggered wheels and tires maximize grip and stability while carbon ceramic brakes5 on Plaid provide extra stopping power.

slider4.title: Optimized Performance
slider4.subtitle: Staggered wheels and tires maximize grip and stability while carbon ceramic brakes5 on Plaid provide extra stopping power.

detSafety.title: Safety Comes Standard
detSafety.description: Tesla vehicles are equipped with the latest safety features, helping keep you and your passengers safer on the road. Autopilot enables your vehicle to steer, accelerate and brake automatically within its lane under your active supervision. A strong frame and low-mounted battery pack offers enhanced occupant protection and low rollover.

features.text: Rear, side and forward-facing cameras provide complete visibility
Visual processing detects objects up to 250 meters away
Tesla Vision monitors vehicles, assists with parking and helps avoid collisions
